short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes CIA-controlled beta simp search tabs and re-adds the "Maps" tab (FUCK THE EU!)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
